amendment.description: Amendment sought to add nonseverability language which provides that if any provision of the bill is held invalid, then the entire Act shall be considered invalid.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 106-311 to strike the existing section 1601 in the bill regarding severability and to replace it with new section 1601 providing for nonseverability of provisions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ewing amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 259 (Roll no. 418).
